intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides comprehensive information about the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Riparian Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product for 2012 and 2018. It details the product’s purpose, which is to deliver a high-resolution dataset of riparian zones along selected rivers across the EEA-38 countries and the UK. The manual outlines the product's characteristics, methodology, potential applications, quality assessment procedures, and technical support, serving as a primary resource for users seeking to understand and utilise this geospatial data effectively.
keywords: European Catchment and Rivers Network System
